Reviews.Title: “Messy room”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Room not ready by check in time. Room wardrobe not useable. No railing for hanging clothes. Room not made, linen not changed for the 2nd day. Breakfast time shown on in your website as 0700 - 0900, also printed in room as 0730 - 0930 hrs. But actually from 0900 - 1100 hrs.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: After having visited Dam many times i knew precisely what to expect from the hotel and i must say i was left pleasantly surprised! still had the issues of the old dutch staircase (yet to find one hospitable staircase in 5 plus years of visiting) and the room not being the cleanest but it was safe, secure and great value for money. A perfect retreat from the hustle and bustle of Central station and the RLD. Very smoker friendly, in fact just very tourist friendly in general. Have a pizza from the restuarant downstairs! Thanks for a great stay guys be back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Bad acommodation choice”
Reviews.Author: Huseyin C Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The hotels location is very good, but the hotel itself is bad, room was dirty, smelling very bad, when you get shower, the water generally flow into the room, if you do not understand the towel left on the ground, behind the bathroom door!! In my room, I could not open the window (giotine window) . The breakfast times are not suitable for businnes accommodations (09:00 - 14:00)! I generally booked hotels from easytobook web site, and never saw any difference between the website and the hotel staff about the price? But in this hotel (this was the first time for me), they wanted me also extra money (they said, it was for taxes!!!)

Reviews.Title: “great stay - great location”
Reviews.Author: Laura G Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: perfect location, 2 min from central station and a further 2 min into the city centre. Breakfast was ok but always served straight away. We stopped at the front of the hotel and the noise from the road was loud during the day as it is on one of the busiest roads but was quite for the night. Overall the stay was pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Very good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: LORENA R Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Employees very friendly and sympathetic. Average rooms, clean and low light. The spacious bathroom with hot water and clean. Very quiet environment at night and the rooms have heating. Breakfast is the best hostel, juice or coffee, toast, ham, cheese and a fried egg, excellent for a long day in Amsterdam.

Reviews.Title: “It's better to stay on the road”
Reviews.Author: bartleby78
Reviews.Content: We weren't able to use the bathroom since it was totally dirty. Rooms were nasty and cold. The owners of the hotel were absolutely rude with us (we were three girls) and, moreover, they pretended that we paid them before seeing the rooms. In conclusion, we suggest strongly to you not to accommodate in this place.

HotelInfo.Name: Il Giardino Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Prins Hendrikkade 97-98, Amsterdam 7244 AV, The Netherlands
